title: Doblon Siglos KARAOKE -AYER-RECORDER PRO v1.2.22
description:
Doblon Siglos KARAOKE - PLAYER-RECORDER PRO v1.2.22



Play CD+G discs on your computer. 



Siglos Karaoke Player/Recorder is a software karaoke CD+G player. It will change your computer into a karaoke machine!



Siglos Karaoke Player/Recorder allows you to:

Play CD+G discs directly from your CD-ROM drive and CD+G songs (MP3+G and ZIP) from the hard disc
Play MIDI Karaoke songs
Change the key of the song to better suit your voice
Record yourself while you sing along
Listen to your recording
Use playlists to manage your songs
Use full screen mode to get full karaoke experience
Use dual monitor support: play on one and manage on the other
Play Multiplex CD+G discs
Add image backgrounds to CD+G and MIDI karaoke

ImageImage

Siglos Karaoke Player/Recorder is an easy to use software karaoke machine.
Play karaoke songs
Siglos Karaoke Player/Recorder allows you to play:
CD+G karaoke discs (directly from your CD drive)
Important notice: your CD-ROM drive has to be able to extract CD+G subcodes. Most of modern drives are capable of this, but we cannot guarantee it will work on all devices. Use trial version to see if your CD-ROM drive works fine before you purchase this software.
MP3+G (pairs of CDG and MP3 files)
Zipped MP3+G
BIN (non-compressed CD+G)
MIDI Karaoke (MID and KAR formats)
Any multimedia file supported by Windows (yes, you can play AVI or MPEG too)
Play in full screen mode
Use dual monitor support to play on TV screen connected to your laptop
Use background images to make those standard CD+Gs look better
Use MIDI karaoke search to get karaoke files from the internet

Image

OS : Windows XP and Vista
FILES : 1X14.0mb
COMPRESS: WinRar
LANGUAGE: English
FIX : KeyGen
